body_html:
Sorry, it's a stupid question..
I install tensorflow via sudo pip install tensorflow --upgrade, which does not support GPU.
It works fine with sudo pip install tensorflow-gpu --upgrade.
This issue can be closed.

body:
Sorry, it's a stupid question..
I install tensorflow via `sudo pip install tensorflow --upgrade`, which does not support GPU.
It works fine with `sudo pip install tensorflow-gpu --upgrade`.
This issue can be closed.
